page.description: Inserts data defined as JSON into a SQL database.

discussion.p: The *[xb:Import JSON into SQL Database]* tool can be used to insert data from a JSON object into a SQL database. You can either create a new table to match the structure of the JSON data, or you can import the JSON data into an existing table.
To select the import genie, select the Import JSON into SQL Table menu option from the Tools menu when the Web Control Panel has focus.

description.p: When you select this menu item, the following dialog will be shown:
